name: EscapeOS
description:
EscapeOS is an explorative “escape room” puzzler, where only your actions determine of the progress of your PENDING progress bars… 

Can you complete enough of your To-Do’s to complete the game and figure out what the fudge is happening? The game demo time is estimated around 10-25 minutes, depending on your puzzling skills. 

The best tester during the jam completed the game in 17 minutes flat - see if you can beat that :)...

 Controls = Mouse & Keyboard 

Aspect Ratio = 16:9 

Enjoy and please share/vote if you like the game 

/Rasmus , Ditte & Anders
